moves.name: Air Blast
moves.description: Aang shoots a powerful blast of air from his staff

moves.name: Tornado Whirl
moves.description: Aang spins a dazzling whirlwind at his opponent

moves.name: Dolphin Spray
moves.description: Aang showers his opponent with a strong burst of water

characters.name: Azula
characters.description: has a few screws loose but her raw power is crazy

moves.name: Blue Flame
moves.description: Azula brings the heat in this move

moves.name: Hot Chain
moves.description: Azula uses flames to chain her opponent in heat

moves.name: Screw Loose
moves.description: Azula has a mental breakdown and lets out a piercing scream

moves.name: Fire Fists
moves.description: Azula pummels her opponent with burning punches

new moves.name: Fire breath
new moves.description: Aang harnesses his inner dragon, unleashing a breath of fire
